title: Error 1935 help
body: Recently I had to do a factory reset on my pc due to installing a hard drive incorrectly. After fixing my pc I was forced to use windows 7 rather then windows 10 because the get it free time is over. Now I am getting the error 1935 every time I try to download LoL, I have looked up many forums on how to get it fixed but 90% of them do not have fixes. Please help if possible.

replies.body: This error can happen often after reformatting or getting a new rig, and usually means that Windows needs to be update.  Update your windows to its current state, and download [Visual C+++](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387) which is a necessary component to proceed with installation.  Hope that helps!
